shortIntro.title: What Your Device Needs for Smooth Clash Royale Gameplay
shortIntro.para1: Clash Royale is a real-time strategy and card-based battle game that requires consistent performance, stable touch response, and low input delay. Since battles are fast-paced, even minor lag or slow animations can affect your match outcome.
shortIntro.para2: Although Clash Royale is not a graphics-heavy title, better processors, higher refresh rate screens, and faster storage help deliver smoother troop deployment, quicker elixir management, and more responsive controls.

intro: Below are the updated minimum and recommended specifications required to run Clash Royale smoothly on Android and iOS devices. These values are based on official requirements, competitive player feedback, and real device testing.

recommended.Internet: Low-ping 4G/5G or Wi-Fi for competitive ladder matches

ios_intro: iOS devices maintain strong performance in Clash Royale due to better optimization and quicker touch response.
fps_intro: Clash Royale is fast-paced, and smooth animations help players react faster. While the game is capped internally, high refresh rate screens still improve overall responsiveness.
settings_intro: For stable gameplay and quick troop placement, the following settings are ideal for low-end and high-end devices.

low_end.title: Battery Saver Mode
low_end.value: Turn OFF to avoid animation slowdowns

low_end.title: Background Apps
low_end.value: Close all to reduce touch delay

low_end.title: Touch Sensitivity
low_end.value: Increase slightly for faster card drops

high_end.title: Game Booster
high_end.value: Turn ON for better frame timing

high_end.title: Thermal Control
high_end.value: Avoid overheating during long ladder sessions

faqIntroText: These are the most commonly asked questions about Clash Royale’s performance and device optimization.

faqList.question: Does Clash Royale need a powerful device?
faqList.answer: No, but a faster chipset improves troop deployment speed and reduces input delay.

faqList.question: Does the game support 90Hz or 120Hz displays?
faqList.answer: The game itself is capped, but high refresh rate screens make touch animations smoother.

faqList.question: Why is internet stability important?
faqList.answer: Clash Royale is real-time, so unstable ping can cause card drop delays and lag spikes.
